statements: UPDATE health_monitoring_data SET heart_rate = 80, body_temperature = 98.6 WHERE user_id = 1

UPDATE health_monitoring_data SET steps_count = 5000, sleep_quality = 8, device_id = 101 WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE WearableDevices SET device_name = 'Fitbit Charge 4' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE UserHealthData SET heart_rate = 70, steps_count = 8000, recorded_at = '2023-04-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE WearableDevices SET device_type = 'Smartwatch' WHERE device_name = 'Fitbit' AND user_id = 123;
UPDATE UserHealthData SET heart_rate = 80, blood_pressure = '{"systolic": 120, "diastolic": 80}', steps_count = 5000 WHERE user_id = 456 AND recorded_at >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE users SET age = 30 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE health_data SET heart_rate = 80, steps = 5000 WHERE data_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET age = 30 WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE health_data SET calories_burned = 1500, steps = 8000 WHERE user_id = 1;

UPDATE users SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE user_id = 201
UPDATE wearables_data SET data_value = 10.5, user_id = 123 WHERE device_id = 1;

UPDATE steps_data SET step_count = 10000, distance = 5.5, calories_burned = 300.75 WHERE sensor_id = 3;
